text: Hussein Ali Thajil (born 1 July 1958) is a former Iraqi football forward who played for Iraq in the 1978 Asian Games. Hesham played for the national team in 1978.http://niiiis.com/players2.html ==References== Category:Iraqi footballers Category:Iraq international footballers Category:Living people Category:Association football forwards Category:Footballers at the 1978 Asian Games Category:1958 births
title: Hussein Ali Thajil
